version_description:
We've improved our ability to track errors and crashes. We've also addressed issues regarding restoring in app purchases.

iPhone X users rejoice - we've improved support for your weird screens.

We've cleaned up the summary page a bit, which will allow us to continue adding support for new games much faster. Game support can now be added without an update, so keep an eye out for new titles in the directory!

This release also contains bug fixes and performance improvements.
We've added support for Rainbow Six Siege. You can also now subscribe to Fortnite player profiles to receive push notifications when their stats update.

This update has some major new features!

- Leaderboards
- PUBG Support
- Rocket League Support
- New and improved logo, app icons, and image assets
- Graphs are back!
- Performance improvements

This version also improves our ability to track errors and includes some other bug fixes. We probably made some bugs too, so please let us know if you discover anything via the Support link in the drawer menu.
We've added support for Rainbow Six Siege. You can also now subscribe to Fortnite player profiles to receive push notifications when their stats update.
We've redesigned portions of the app which we hope makes a meaningful improvement to app stability, performance and ease of use. As always, please report any bugs through the settings menu!

Slowness + crashing fix.

We believe we've addressed the problem in this update. If it continues for you, please send us a support email to support@tracker.network, it's the fastest way of getting our attention.

Version 2! We've introduced several improvements to the app:

- App navigation: you can now quickly switch between games, and we'll remember which games you viewed most recently.
- Game meta: for supported games, we'll now show information relating to the game's meta. For Fortnite, this includes current store items, and we'll be adding news and weapons information soon.
- Notifications: get notified when your favourite streamer, pro or your own stats are updated

Complete rewritten from scratch, our brand new app!
Supporting Fortnite and Rocket League, stay tuned for the rest coming back in the next few weeks.

Fortnite Competitive EVENTS!!!!

Tons of bug fixes, design improvements, optimizations.
Tons of bug fixes, design improvements.  Huge new features coming soon!

- Warzone: Added support for COD: Warzone!
- Fortnite: View your Power Ranking and past Event placements in the Events tab on your profile
- Fortnite: Added a Calendar and News in the Events section

- Warzone: Added support for COD: Warzone!
- Fortnite: View your Power Ranking and past Event placements in the Events tab on your profile
- Fortnite: Added a Calendar and News in the Events section
- Change App Name
